q: `` requires unequivocal international support through an appropriate United Nations Security Council resolution to sanction the use of force,'' Ajumogobia wrote. He said the use of force did not have to mean an invasion. Legitimate force can include, for example, a naval blockade to enforce sanctions which might be imposed against Gbagbo, he said. UN peacekeepers have been operating in Ivory Coast since the official end of a civil war in 2003 and are protecting Alassane Ouattara 's base, but Gbagbo has said they should quit and accused them

Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. I wish him well in his new endeavors, said Steve Ballmer . are easy to take care of. People who frequently travel for business are especially fond of owning rabbits,'' said rabbit seller Chen Yuan . But People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals objects.
